TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner

summary.span: Provides a base control designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a Web server control.

span.span: Provides a base control designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供基底控制項設計工具類別可以繼承自並擴充設計主應用程式，在 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class provides a base control designer class that can be inherited from and extended to provide design-time support for a Web server control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 物件模型，可處理設計階段呈現已獲得改善，透過舊的版本中，使用下列新基底類別提供簡化的物件模型的存取權：The object model for working with design-time rendering is improved over earlier versions, with the following new base classes to provide access to the simplified object model: - 這不是新的但已經過大幅改良。, which is not new, but has been greatly improved. - .. - .. ## 自動格式化Automatic Formatting 您可以建立各種不同的自動和預先定義的格式，可簡化網頁開發人員會將複雜的樣式變更套用至自訂 Web 伺服器控制項的程序。You can create a variety of automatic and pre-defined formats that can simplify the process of page developers who are applying complex style changes to custom Web server controls. 例如，控制項，它是衍生自類別中，提供許多可供選擇的自動格式。For example, the control, which derives from the class, provides many automatic formats from which to choose. 若要實作，並提供您的自訂控制項中的自動格式設定，使用下列功能：To implement and provide automatic formatting in your custom controls, use the following features: - 屬性。The property. - 方法The method. - 類別。The class. - 類別。The class. ## 動作清單 （也就是智慧標籤）Action Lists (Smart Tags) 動作清單是功能表的重要或廣泛使用的網頁開發人員使用的控制項可以執行設計階段使用者介面 (UI) 中的工作，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。Action lists are menus of important or widely used tasks that a page developer who uses a control can perform in a design-time user interface (UI), such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 比方說，您的控制項的設計階段檢視可以提供一個功能表的 可用的工作。For example, the design-time view of your control could provide a menu of available tasks. 這包括自動格式化控制項的工作。This includes a task to format the control automatically. 若要深入了解動作清單，開始的下列功能：To learn about action lists, start with the following features: - 屬性。The property. - 類別。The class. - 方法The method. - 類別。The class. - 類別。The class. - 類別。The class. ## 控制項設計工具區域Control Designer Regions 區域是在 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段檢視中的可編輯區域。Regions are editable areas in the design-time view of a Web server control. 這項功能會提供類似於 WYSIWYG 編輯範本內容、 內部的控制項和屬性在設計階段。This feature offers WYSIWYG-like editing of the template content, inner controls, and properties at design time. 您可以在區域中建立控制項的控制項設計工具，或您可以使用工具箱將控制項拖放至區域。You can have the control designer create controls in regions or you can use the Toolbox to drag and drop controls into regions. 區域管理具有下列功能：Regions are managed with the following features: - 方法The method. - 類別。The class. - 類別。The class. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. ## 範本Templates 設計階段編輯樣板化控制項，例如建立 UI 的模型控制項，並已獲得大幅改進舊版。The model for creating a UI for design-time editing of templated controls, such as the control, has been greatly improved from earlier versions. 您可以建立複雜的自訂控制項，包含控制項的各個組件的範本，而且您的自訂控制項設計工具可協助網頁開發人員要修改範本具有下列功能：You can create complex custom controls that include templates for various parts of the control, and your custom control designer can help page developers who are modifying templates with the following features: - 屬性。The property. - 屬性。The property. - 類別。The class. ## 設計階段呈現Design-Time Rendering 類別具有下列方法來支援 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段呈現。The class has the following methods to support design-time rendering of the Web server control. 這些方法大多會與舊版相同：Most of these methods are the same as in earlier versions: - 方法The method. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的設計工具類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple designer class that derives from the class. 此控制項設計工具支援自訂`TextControl`類別，並提供命令以在設計階段變更控制項的文字大小。This control designer supports a custom `TextControl` class and provides a command to change the text size of a control at design time. 藉由指定的控制項設計工具中的控制項設計工具會與控制項相關聯物件上的宣告`TextControl`類別。The control designer is associated with the control by specifying the control designer in a object declaration on the `TextControl` class. 要保存屬性變更的索引鍵，從 HTML 標記的控制項設計工具位於`ToggleTextSize`方法的自訂`ActionList`類別。The key to persisting property changes from the control designer to the HTML markup is found in the `ToggleTextSize` method of the custom `ActionList` class. 若要嘗試的範例，請新增 System.Design.dll 組件的參考並編譯程式碼。To try the example, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly and compile the code. [!code-csharp[ControlDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/cs/TextControlDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/vb/TextControlDesigner.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlDesignerSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/cs/TextControlDesigner.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlDesignerSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlDesignerSample/vb/TextControlDesigner.aspx#8)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的複合控制項，與並控制項，以及兩個內部的控制項上設定文字屬性的屬性，也和屬性的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a and a control, together with properties to set the Text properties on both internal controls, and also the and properties of the control. 關聯的控制項設計工具類別會建立三個命令，其中每個在控制項上設定兩個屬性，而且可以回復與設計主應用程式的復原功能。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control, and can be rolled back with the undo functionality of the design host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 完整的 Web 伺服器控制項包括不僅控制項，但同時，可能的話，對應控制項設計工具類別衍生自類別和格式化類別衍生自類別。A complete Web server control includes not only the control, but also, possibly, a corresponding control designer class that is derived from the class and a formatting class that is derived from the class. 屬性是集合的執行個體類別。The property is a collection of instances of the class. 如需工作的範例中的自動格式化[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，請參閱。For a working example of automatic formatting in [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂控制項設計工具中的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a custom control designer. 衍生的控制項設計工具會實作加上三個自訂的自動格式衍生自執行個體的屬性類別。The derived control designer implements the property by adding three instances of a custom automatic format that are derived from the class. [!code-csharp[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/CS/DesignerAutoFormat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/VB/DesignerAutoFormat.vb#1)]

Controls that automatically expose AutoFormats get a task list and context commands for their formats. When you are using automatic formats, use the property to set the properties in your callback function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法用來建立 HTML 標記，以在設計階段顯示控制項的錯誤訊息。Use the method to create HTML markup to display an error message for a control at design time. 值`errorMessage`指定控制項的使用者顯示在設計階段的當地語系化的字串。The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time. 類別實作方法會傳回具有兩個資料列的資料表，如下所示：The class implementation of the method returns a table with two rows, as follows: - 第一個資料列包含的型別名稱和網站名稱屬性物件。The first row contains the type name and site name for the property of the object. - 第二個資料列都包含輸入的錯誤訊息字串。The second row contains the input error message string. 若要產生的例外狀況相關聯的錯誤訊息 HTML 標記，請使用多載。To generate HTML markup for an error message with an associated exception, use the overload. 若要產生例外狀況的 HTML 標記，而不指定當地語系化的錯誤訊息，請使用方法。To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the method.

span.para: 多載在功能上相當於呼叫方法，以設定為 e 。
The overload is functionally equivalent to calling the method with e set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供簡單的 HTML 標記，可用來在設計階段顯示控制項的錯誤和例外狀況詳細資料。Use the method to provide simple HTML markup that can be used to display error and exception details for a control at design time. 值`errorMessage`指定控制項的使用者顯示在設計階段的當地語系化的字串。The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time. 類別實作方法會傳回具有兩個資料列的資料表，如下所示：The class implementation of the method returns a table with two rows, as follows: - 第一個資料列包含的型別名稱和網站名稱屬性物件。The first row contains the type name and site name for the property of the object. - 第二個資料列包含的輸入的錯誤訊息和例外狀況的字串。The second row contains the input error message and the string of the exception. 若要產生錯誤訊息 HTML 標記，而不指定例外狀況，請使用多載。To generate HTML markup for an error message without specifying an exception, use the overload. 若要產生例外狀況的 HTML 標記，而不指定當地語系化的錯誤訊息，請使用方法。To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the method.

span.para: 應該呼叫方法，從或方法發生例外狀況時。
The method should be called from the or method when exceptions occur.

summary.span: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control.

span.span: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control.

span.para: 典型的設計模式是嘗試透過相關聯的控制項，取得 HTML 標記，如果發生錯誤，然後呼叫方法。如果不需要標記由控制項，呼叫方法，如果未提供特定的標記，覆寫呼叫方法，其中應包含類型和控制項 ID 的相關資訊。

The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the method. If no markup is returned by the control, call the method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法會通知由設計主應用程式屬性`component`，變更會發生在相關聯的控制項，且如果由設計主應用程式中，未取消變更，則會叫用指定`callback`使用指定`context`，然後通知設計主應用程式可以在變更完成。The implementation of the method notifies the design host, which is determined by the property of `component`, that a change is occurring in the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context`, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed. 如果設計主應用程式或相關聯的控制項就會擲回的靜態`Canceled`例外狀況欄位例外狀況，交易被取消而不叫用`callback`。If the design host or the associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的複合控制項，與並控制項，以及設定標籤文字、 屬性以及， ，和的屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a and a control, together with properties to set the label text, and also the , , and properties of the control. 關聯的控制項設計工具類別會建立三個命令，其中每個控制項設定兩個屬性。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control. 藉由使用方法中，您可以使用復原功能的設計主應用程式，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，回復每個已完成的交易，做為一個單位。By using the method, you can use the undo functionality of the design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], to roll back each completed transaction as a unit. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法會通知由設計主應用程式屬性`component`，來指定進行變更`member`（屬性或方法） 關聯的控制項而且，如果變更未取消由設計主應用程式、 叫用指定`callback`使用指定`context`做為引數，然後通知設計主應用程式可以在變更完成。The implementation of the method notifies the design host, which is determined by the property of `component`, that a change is occurring to the specified `member` (property or method) of the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context` as the argument, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed. 如果設計主應用程式或相關聯的控制項就會擲回的靜態`Canceled`例外狀況欄位例外狀況，交易被取消而不叫用`callback`。If the design host or associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主應用程式的設計介面中的控制項上的特定動作會引發事件。The event is raised by the design host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 例如，事件就會引發下列條件：For example, an event is raised for the following conditions: - 使用者按一下控制項。The user clicks the control. - 在設計介面上的控制項設計工具繪製。The control designer paints on the design surface. - 使用者進入或結束範本編輯模式的控制項。The user enters or exits template editing mode for the control. 類別提供的預設委派以處理事件。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 類別衍生自覆寫方法來處理使用者按一下控制項時所引發的事件。Classes deriving from override the method to process events that are raised when the user clicks a control. 方法可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 預設實作方法傳回時不執行任何處理。The default implementation of the method returns without performing any processing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式可點選區域的控制與使用中的事件識別被按下區域的物件。The following code example shows how to use a handler for the event in a clickable region of the control and use a object to identify the region that is being clicked. 此程式碼範例是針對較大的程式碼範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger code example for the class. [!code-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當複製的項目時，可能會有一些內部資料結構，例如`meta:`應該複製控制項中包含的控制項設計工具的屬性。Whenever an item is cloned, there might be some internal data structures, such as `meta:` attributes, that should be included in the cloned control by the control designer. 網頁開發人員可能會增加`meta:`屬性至控制項的標記沒有任何方法，也沒有理由，來區分這些標記可能是控制項。A page developer might add `meta:` attributes to the markup of a control and there is no way, nor is there a reason, for the control to distinguish what those tags might be. 因此，如果您的控制項設計工具可用來編輯複雜的內容或格式，將變更套用至頁面之前，您會建立控制項的複製品，將原始控制項和複製品傳遞至此方法，然後時所做的變更加入標記中，會保存所有`meta:`屬性也會保存。Therefore, if your control designer provides a way to edit complex properties or formats before applying changes to a page, you would create a clone of the control, pass both the original control and the clone to this method, and then, when the changes are persisted to the tag, all `meta:` attributes are also persisted.

value.span: 如果控制項設計工具針對設計階段預覽使用控制項的暫時副本，則為 ；否則，如果控制項設計工具針對控制項設計工具中所包含的控制項使用 屬性，則為 。

span.span: , if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, , if the control designer uses the property for the control contained in the control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，則屬性會傳回控制項的暫存副本。If the property is `true`, the property returns a temporary copy of the control. 變更暫存控制項不會保存在文件。Changes to the temporary control are not persisted to the document. 如果屬性是`false`，則屬性傳回的執行個體控制項的屬性。If the property is `false`, the property returns an instance of the property for the control. 控制項的執行個體的變更會保存。Changes to the instance of the control are persisted. 中設定物件用來設定的值屬性。The setting in the object is used to set the value of the property. 因此，設定會決定所傳回的控制項型別屬性的基底中類別。Therefore, the setting determines the type of control that is returned by the property in the base class. 如果在控制項設計工具的宣告中，未指定物件的行為相當於指定屬性設為`false`。If the is not specified in the control designer declaration, the object behavior is equivalent to specifying the property as `false`.

span.para: 衍生自的自訂設計工具類別可以覆寫屬性，並忽略物件。一般而言，以指出屬性一律會傳回控制項的暫存副本，覆寫屬性一律傳回。表示屬性一律會傳回控制項的執行個體，覆寫屬性一律傳回。例如，類別衍生自，而且永遠傳回如屬性。

Custom designers that are derived from the class can override the property and ignore the object. Generally, to indicate that the property always returns a temporary copy of the control, override the property to always return . To indicate that the property always returns an instance of the control, override the property to always return . For example, the class derives from the and always returns for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性使用屬性來判斷它的傳回值。The property uses the property to determine its return value. 如果屬性是`true`，則屬性會傳回控制項的暫存副本。If the property is `true`, the property returns a temporary copy of the control. 不會保存暫存控制項的變更。Changes to the temporary control are not persisted. 如果屬性是`false`，則屬性傳回的執行個體控制項的屬性。If the property is `false`, the property returns an instance of the property for the control. 控制項的執行個體的變更會保存。Changes to the instance of the control are persisted. 中設定物件用來設定的值屬性。The setting in the object is used to set the value of the property. 因此，設定會決定所傳回的控制項型別屬性的基底中類別。Therefore, the setting determines the type of control that is returned by the property in the base class. 如果在控制項設計工具的宣告中，未指定物件的行為相當於指定屬性設為`false`。If the is not specified in the control designer declaration, the object behavior is equivalent to specifying the property as `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將標示控制項設計工具與屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to mark a control designer with the attribute. 在程式碼範例衍生 Web 伺服器控制項從類別和關聯的自訂控制項設計工具的實作中的控制項。The code example derives a Web server control from the class and associates the control with a custom control designer implementation. 在控制項設計工具類別宣告會標示`SupportsPreviewControl`屬性設為`true`。The control designer class declaration is marked with the `SupportsPreviewControl` attribute set to `true`. 控制項設計工具會覆寫方法，然後按一下 顯示斜體在設計階段中控制項的屬性。The control designer overrides the method, and then displays the property of the control in italic at design time.
